PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12982023-12-15HC
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Medical Devices Regulations (Medical Devices for an Urgent Public Health Need)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS (MEDICAL DEVICES FOR AN URGENT PUBLIC HEALTH NEED) in order to (1) broaden the previously published COVID-19 framework to apply to other public health emergencies; and (2) address a policy gap and clarify certain post-market requirements from the original framework.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0277 Publication Date: 2024-01-03
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS (MEDICAL DEVICES FOR AN URGENT PUBLIC HEALTH NEED) in order to (1) broaden the previously published COVID-19 framework to apply to other public health emergencies; and (2) address a policy gap and clarify certain post-market requirements from the original framework.
